Parameter.description: The token for authentication.(Send authToken as query parameter, body parameter or as a header)
First Name of the customer passed as a body parameter
Last Name of the customer passed as a body parameter
Email-ID of the customer passed as a body parameter
Password of the customer account passed as a body parameter
Mobile Number of the customer passed as a body parameter

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
            "error": false,
            "message": "customer successfully created",
            "status": 200,
            "data": {
                "isPrime": boolean,
                "_id": String,
                "custId": String,
                "custFirstName": String,
                "custLastName": String,
                "custEmailId": String,
                "custPassword": String,
                "custMobileNumber": Number,
                "custCart": object(type = array)
                "__v": Number
            }
        }
